text: Lacistema is a genus of flowering plants in the family Lacistemataceae.da Silva, J. M., et al. (2014). HPLC-DAD analysis, antileishmanial, antiproliferative, and antibacterial activities of Lacistema pubescens: An Amazonian medicinal plant. BioMed Research International 545038. Some species are used by the indigenous peoples of Brazil for medicinal purposes. There are about 11 species: *Lacistema aggregatum Bergius (Rusby) *Lacistema grandiflorum Schnizl. (syn. L. ellipticum) *Lacistema hasslerianum Chodat *Lacistema krukovii Sleumer *Lacistema lucidum Schnizl. *Lacistema macbridei Baehni (syn. L. macbridii) *Lacistema nena Macbride *Lacistema polystachyum Schnizl. *Lacistema pubescens Mart. (syn. L. ellipticum) *Lacistema robustum Schnizl. *Lacistema serrulatum Mart. (syn. L. leptostachys) ==References== Category:Lacistemataceae Category:Malpighiales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lacistema
